text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the Criminal Injuries Compensation Board.
"Claimant" means the person filing a claim under this subtitle.

section.section:
"Crime" means:
except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a criminal offense under state, federal, or common law that is committed in:
this State; or
another state against a resident of this State; or
an act of international terrorism as defined in Title 18, § 2331 of the United States Code that is committed outside of the United States against a resident of this State.

"Crime" does not include an act involving the operation of a vessel or motor vehicle unless the act is:
a violation of § 20-102, § 20-104, § 21-902, or § 21-904 of the Transportation Article; or
operating a motor vehicle or vessel that results in an intentional injury.

text.section:
"Dependent" means:
a surviving spouse or child of a person; or
a person who is dependent on another person for principal support.
